H0.text: Mars has a warmer average surface temperature than Earth.

H1.text: Moon has a warmer average surface temperature than Earth.

H2.text: Pluto has a warmer average surface temperature than Earth.

H3.text: Venus has a warmer average surface temperature than Earth.

A4.text: The CO2-rich atmosphere generates the strongest greenhouse effect in the Solar System, creating surface temperatures of at least 735 K (462 °C; 864 °F).

A5.text: At the mean surface level, the atmosphere reaches a temperature of 737 K (464 °C; 867 °F) and a pressure 92 times greater than Earth's at sea level.
